$Moore lost Galan's fly in sun.
$Ball hit so hard it hurt Hack's left hand.  Game delayed while trainer rubbed it. Hack was able to continue.
$Bees celebrated NL's 60th anniv. by bringing back many of old stars for ceremonies-2 local teams played game using 1876 rules before the DH.

$Cuccinello lost Allen's pop in sun.  Allen tried for  double. Allen was spiked on hand on play by umpire Stewart. Badly cut, Allen rushed to dugout and went to clubhouse done for game. Allen won't return to starting lineup till July 21.
$Through the wicket. Batter bumped into Herman backing up the play and knocked him down.  Time called but Herman stayed in; no error charged
$Urbanski hit in head by Hubbell, left game but not seriously hurt.
$Berger was hit by a pitch and headed for Derringer on the mound.  Berger then thought better of it and trotted to first.

$Lopez had Herman trapped between third and home and finally tagged him out.  Lopez could have had a double play by tagging Goodman coming into third, as Herman was far out of the baseline, but he chased Herman to tag him anyway.
$Coscarart tried to touch third but could not find the bag. He then threw wildly to home.
$9,923 total attendance.
Total attendance was 8500.
Off MacFayden's glove.
MacFayden dropped Thompson's throw, but threw out Phelps when he took too big a turn at third.
Lanning's throw to third was too late to get Passeau.
Lanning's throw home was to late to force Passeau.

11,112 total attendance.

$Whitehead scored on a very close play.  Thompson made a  great throw and Jackson appeared to be out but Magerkurth called him safe.  The Bees raged at Magerkurth. Giants' manager Bill Terry admitted after the game that he felt that Jackson was out but the call stood.
